name: Chronicles of Mystery - The Tree of Life
description: Find the legendary Tree of Life, which grants immortality to whoever tastes itâ€™s fruits. Your search will lead you across the channels of Venice, through the dark alleys of Cairo and further into the unknown. Chased by ruthless assassins, you will have to solve ancient riddles and face a power that eludes the rules of logic.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/VISTA/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3,2 GHz, Intel Pentium D 2.66 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 3500+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce (6800/7600-7950/8600-8800/9600-9800/GTX 260-280) or Radeon (X1650-1950/HD2400-2900/3650-3870/4650-4870) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0c Additional Notes: mouse, keyboard
